oai_dc:dc.dc:title: MIDAS - Specification and design of the basic MIDAS platform as a service on the cloud
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tonellotto, Nicola
Di Napoli, Claudia
De Francesco, Alberto
Giordano, Maurizio
De Rosa, Fabio
Maesano, Libero
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cloud computing
Elasticity
Virtual Machine
SOA Testing
Web Services
Test Execution
info:eu-repo/classification/acm/D.2.2 Design Tools and Techniques
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Specification and design of the basic MIDAS Platform as a service on the cloud: This deliverable presents an architecture running on the Cloud, designed and configured for integrating the TTworkebnch engine on the Cloud services and providing an integrated platform for creating, configuring and running test user scenarios independently from the underlying platform implementation. It will include demonstrators of the main capabilities such as description of test cases, and support for test cases management and configuration.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: info:eu-repo/grantAgreement/EC/FP7/318786/EU/Model and Inference Driven, Automated testing of Services architectures/MIDAS
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Model and Inference Driven, Automated testing of Services architectures. Deliverable D6.2, 2014.
